thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Au Optronics Acquires Comqi Shares, Board Approves Reduction of of Budgeted Capex

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Au Optronics Acquires Comqi Shares, Board Approves Reduction of of Budgeted Capex

organizations.name: board approves reduction of of budgeted capex

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - AU Optronics Corp:
* SAYS IT OBTAINS SHARES IN COMQI FOR UP TO $28 MILLION * SAYS BOARD APPROVES MONETARY AMOUNT OF THE INVESTMENT AT T$5.281 BILLION ($180.20 million), BUDGETED CAPITAL EXPENDITURES REDUCED BY T$7.909 BILLION Source text on Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 29.3060 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
